metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38288 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Not a Security Issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm2
libtiff-tools - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm2
libtiff5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm2
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-08-24, it appears this CVE has now been rejected for some reason, need to investigate

criterions.comment: tiff package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.9-5ubuntu0.10+esm2').
